City Hall, Truro, Cornwall, England, UK
Best section 2 band - Redruth. Best section 3 band - tie between Porthleven and St Newlyn East. Best soloist - Jack Pascoe - Camborne Town. Best junior soloist - Robert Osborne - St Dennis Youth.
